sentences.english: The so-called security zone is in the buffer zone between South and North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的联安全地带，也就是在南北韩之间的缓冲地带。

sentences.english: The change of anticardiolipin antibody was determined by enzyme linked immunoabsorbent assay (ELISA).
sentences.chinese: 抗心磷脂抗体采用酶联免疫吸附法测定。

sentences.english: Liverpool are set to outbid West Ham United for Lazio midfielder Valon Behrami.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦在对贝赫拉米的出价上击败了西汉姆联。

sentences.english: Represents a symbol binder for unmanaged code.
sentences.chinese: 表示非托管代码的符号联编程序。

sentences.english: Some of the smaller traders are being frozen out by big combines.
sentences.chinese: 一些小间人正受到一些大的联公司的排挤。

sentences.english: In this paper, the join of two trees with a regular monoid is explicitly described.
sentences.chinese: 明确给出了具有正则自同态幺半群的两个树的联。

sentences.english: CRP released into the medium was measured with ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 释放到介质中的CRP用酶联免疫吸附法测定。

sentences.english: Neoshow Media understands you may have unique targeting in mind for your product or service.
sentences.chinese: 新秀联理解您的产品或服务可能会拥有独特的定位。

sentences.english: Of course, his machine must have been connected to a computer.
sentences.chinese: 当然，他的机器一定和电脑联在一起。

sentences.english: Conditioned media was analyzed with enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的进行酶联免疫吸附试验。

sentences.english: The final item concerns the performance of WHO at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 最后一个项目涉及联世卫组织在各个层面的绩效。

sentences.english: The symbol, called the Borromean rings, depicts three rings linked together.
sentences.chinese: 这个符号称为博罗梅安戒指，描绘联在一起3个圆环。

sentences.english: Also, notice how transitions have been used to connect the components.
sentences.chinese: 同样要注意是如何使用过渡把上述要素联在一起。

sentences.english: The average optical density (OD) and inhibition rate were counted by Universal Microplate Spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 通过酶联免疫检测仪计算平均吸光度值和抑制率。

sentences.english: In this sense , merchandisers bring products and customers together.
sentences.chinese: 在这个意义上说，采购员把产品和客户联在一起。

sentences.english: Antibody to nuclear of egg was detected by ELISA coated with yolk.
sentences.chinese: 以鸡卵核为抗原建立了酶联免疫法，检验相应抗体。
